arm_group.description: acupoint electric stimulation combined with tropisetron 6mg before TACE

brief_summary.textblock:
Observation on acupoint electric stimulation combined with tropisetron in preventing and
      treating nausea and vomiting and improving the patient's appetite after TACE for primary or
      metastatic liver cancer patients.

clinical_study.brief_title: Acupoint Electric Stimulation Combined With Tropisetron in Preventing and Treating Nausea and Vomiting After TACE

detailed_description.textblock:
-  Classification of nausea and vomiting, as measured by NCI CTC-AE version 3

        -  The improvement of appetite, as measure by the classification of Appetite in accordance
           with NCI CTC-AE version 3.

        -  Quality of life: use M. D. Anderson symptom scale (the m. d. Anderson Symptom
           Inventory,MDASI)

intervention.description: acupoint electric stimulation combined with tropisetron 6mg before TACE

clinical_study.official_title: Acupoint Electric Stimulation Combined With Tropisetron in Preventing and Treating Nausea and Vomiting After TACE

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
